local_intent: Compute side grasp pose for cocacola_can after ensuring visibility and alignment, then verify the pose key is available.
assumptions: Target becomes visible within 3 detection attempts
Approach and alignment within 0.01 m tolerance are feasible
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence: detect target (with retry), align to it, compute side grasp into key 'goal_pose', verify PoseAvailable before downstream GraspAtPose.
